text: PROTERRA, or Programme for Land Redistribution and Stimulation of Agroindustry in the North and Northeast, was a Brazilian government programme of the 1970s to address rural poverty founded following the approval of the Land Statute in 1964.Gary N. Howe, David Goodman Smallholders and Structural Change in the Brazilian Economy In the Amazon basin it was supported by the World Bank.Anthony L. Hall Developing Amazonia 1989 ==References== Category:World Bank Category:Brazilian legislation Category:Land reform Category:Northeast Region, Brazil Category:North Region, Brazil
title: Proterra (Brazil)
